life_date: Utagawa Hiroshige, Japanese, 1797 – 1858; Takenouchi Magohachi, Publisher, Japanese, 1781–1854
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: The Fifty-three Stations along the Tōkaidō (Tōkaidō gojūsan tsugi no uchi 東海道五十三次之内), also known as the First Tōkaidō or Hōeidō Tōkaidō
text: The first state is defined by having lines in knees of the figure at right.
title: Kanbara: Night Snow [first state]
